if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and ( /contacts/gr_act/b ='b' or /contacts/gr_act/p ='p' or /contacts/gr_act/cinfo ='cinfo'), indexed-repeat( /contacts/contact_info/loc_group/concat_location , /contacts/contact_info ,position(..)),if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and /contacts/gr_act/ph ='ph' and /contacts/gr_act/cinfo !='cinfo',pulldata('contact','concat_location','contact_id', /contacts/phone_repeat/ph_contact_id ), if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='update_c' and /contacts/gr_act/ph ='ph' and /contacts/gr_act/cinfo !='cinfo', pulldata('phone','location','phone_id', /contacts/phone_repeat/phone_id ),'')))

if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and ( /contacts/gr_act/b ='b' or /contacts/gr_act/p ='p' or /contacts/gr_act/cinfo ='cinfo'), indexed-repeat( /contacts/contact_info/type_group/type , /contacts/contact_info ,position(..)),if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and /contacts/gr_act/ph ='ph' and /contacts/gr_act/cinfo !='cinfo',pulldata('contact','location_type','contact_id', /contacts/phone_repeat/ph_contact_id ), if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='update_c' and /contacts/gr_act/ph ='ph' and /contacts/gr_act/cinfo !='cinfo', pulldata('phone','location_type','phone_id', /contacts/phone_repeat/phone_id ),'')))

if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='update_c' and /contacts/gr_act/r ='r' ,pulldata('role','business','role_id', /contacts/search_gr/sel_role ),if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and /contacts/gr_act/r ='r' and /contacts/gr_act/p ='p' and /contacts/gr_act/b !='b' ,pulldata('businesses','business_title','business_id', /contacts/search_gr/s_b ), if( /contacts/gr_act/action ='new_c' and /contacts/gr_act/r ='r' and /contacts/gr_act/b ='b' , /contacts/b_repeat/b_gr/bus_title ,'empty')))
